speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: We got to a big pay increase, first time in over 10 years.
politifact_statement: We just got you a big pay raise, first time in 10 years. We got you a big pay increase, first time in over 10 years. I fought for you. That was the hardest one to get.
verified_claim: Says the 2018 defense authorization bill includes raises for the military "for the first time in 10 years."
verified_claim_article_title: Did Donald Trump sign the first military pay raise in 10 years?
